title: The Purpose of Marriage
summary: No summary available.

title: The Revenge of the Abandoned Daughter of a Prestigious Magic Family
summary:
“Lucia, I can't express how thankful I am that you're here.”

The most powerful mage family in the empire, the Rodbell family. And beneath that glorious name lies the family’s disgrace, the half-blood Rodbell.

“I’m really glad you're my daughter.”

I’ve endured all kinds of contempt and worked hard just to hear these words. For my entire life, craving affection, my father smiled for the first time and said to me, “With your lowly body, Rodbell will enjoy its golden age for the next hundred years. Be proud.”

The Abyss (Abyssus), a bottomless pit, so deep and wide that the end is invisible, where the Evil God is sealed. To maintain its power, once every hundred years, Rodbell’s bloodline must be sacrificed there.

‘I can't die like this.’

I couldn’t let my death be used and discarded for them. As they were all distracted, I tried to escape.

‘Goodbye. Foolish, dumb Lucia.’

With an angelic smile and the most dreadful malice, I fell into hell.

──────────

[Something interesting has fallen.]

In the endless darkness, a soft voice filled with laughter approached like salvation.

“I’ll help you.”

With an irresistible sweet proposal.

“How about this time, you make them fall into the abyss?”

──────────

I returned to the past.

I was about to leave after achieving everything I wanted.

“I’ll give Rodbell to you. I’ll give you whatever you desire. So…”

Why you?

The one who hated me the most.

“Don’t leave, Lucia.”

Why are you clinging to me?

title: The Top 100 Young Lady
summary: Alban realized he had been reincarnated as the villainous noble in a certain novel. Just as he began training in swordsmanship and magic to avoid defeat by the protagonist, he learned that Leticia, a noblewoman surrounded by nasty rumors, was to become his wife! He was nervous about what kind of "evil woman" she might be... but, upon meeting her, he found an incredibly pure girl — angelic, and exactly his type! Alban, forgetting all about avoiding his doom due to her adorableness, resolved to take revenge on the mastermind who had set up his beloved wife! Using their villainous reputation to their advantage, they set out to lure the culprit, but... will they succeed?

title: Shut up, Evil Dragon, I don’t want to raise a child with you anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: Gold Queen
summary: I'm Teru! Just your wee lil' horny high school girl who's trying to become a mangaka! One day, while I was lost in my sexual fantasies, I got hit by a truck and was reincarnated into an isekai! Though I became a slave of the beautiful elf queen, Sirius, I've got a wholesome orc as my roommate, and there's cute elves all around, so I have to say I'm having a pretty time!

title: Black Fox: Sword Master Of Mount Kunlun
summary: A true Taoist’s martial arts exorcism record!  A mysterious organization seeks to unleash yokai upon the world, plunging it into chaos. While tracking them down, the master suddenly disappears.  Ten years later.  A lone Taoist practitioner, Tang Chan, encounters Jin Seorang, who is being pursued by dangerous men. Out of curiosity, Tang Chan decides to rescue Jin Seorang.  Amazed by Tang Chan’s martial prowess and Taoist arts, Jin Seorang seeks his help.  Jin Seorang’s enemy, Plum Moon Hall, is one of the infamous Seven Demon Clans, a sinister martial sect known for brainwashing people and turning them into yokai servants.  As Tang Chan helps Jin Seorang break Plum Moon Hakl’s dark magic, they discover that Plum Moon Hall’s leader knows the whereabouts of Tang Chan’s missing master.  Facing an unknown malevolence, Tang Chan realizes that Plum Moon Hall, the Seven Demon Clans, and an even greater force in the shadows are all tied to his master’s disappearance.  Even after all his master’s efforts, the world remains in turmoil. A young Taoist who follows the will of the heavens continues to wield his taoist arts, striving to restore balance to the world!

title: The Necromancer Family’s Young Heir
summary:
“Death is only the beginning.” 

Truer words were never spoken for young Leon von Marbas, the heir to a once-great house of necromancers. Forced to execute his own father by the lord of a rival house, Leon suddenly finds himself the leader of a declining clan under threat from enemies within and without. 

The only way to restore the glory of his house? Leon must strike a pact with the demon Marbas, the original source of the powerful necromancy that House Marbas was once known for…

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=835741)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12051527)

**Official Translations:**     
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/the-necromancer-familys-young-heir/list?title_no=7413)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-necromancer-familys-young-heir/list?title_no=7898)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/the-necromancer-familys-young-heir/list?title_no=8257)

title: F-Class Destiny Hunter
summary:
In a world of abilities known as fortunes, Seo Gangrim brings misfortune to those around him. Despite his low rank, people fear his power to steal fortunes from the dead.

After his entire sect is annihilated by an assassin, Gangrim returns to the past, desperate to prevent its grisly end. He intends to make a difference this time but realizes that even fortunes aren't set in stone.

Will Gangrim be able to save his comrades from their unjust deaths, or will he only bring doom to them all again?

title: Apocalypse Sword God
summary:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

title: The Heroine Wants Me As Her Sister-in-Law
summary:
I am in the world of a R19 novel based on a Little Red Riding Hood who preys on wolves. The problem is that my younger brother is a wolf. I hid us deep in the forest where Red Riding Hood wouldn't find us, and we're going to escape to the human world safely! But one day, I found a child collapsed in the snow and brought her home in order to treat her. But the girl happened to be the female lead: Little Red Riding Hood! "I don't remember anything." She lost her memories from the accident!

---
Eve was once a human woman who loved to read romance novels. But after being reincarnated as an ice magic-wielding wolf hybreed in one of her favorite stories, Eve runs into a dragon hybreed named Rahel who will kill her in the future and fall in love with her little brother, Sion. Now, Eve thinks her only hope of survival is to save enough money to move to the human world. But as Rahel grows more attached to her, Eve has no idea if she'll cool Rahel's fiery nature or burn in a blazing inferno!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26474&contentId=474&platform=IA)

title: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman
summary:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?

title: Beatrice
summary:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero…  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---

title: The Wicked Ladies in Waiting
summary:
Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

---
Commoner orphan Julia Arte is cursed with repeatedly dying and being reborn on the same snowy mountain trail. Now on her ninth life, she is determined to break the curse by getting revenge on her former lover Vasily Marjoram, who not only left her to die but sent assassins to kill her. After becoming the second lady-in-waiting to House Marjoram's sworn enemy, Prince Lewisia Ortega, Julia pulls out all the stops to take down Vasily. But will her scheming bring more trouble than she bargained for?

title: Remember the Time-Limited Grand Duchess
summary:
For Grand Duke Heverus, marriage was nothing more than a means to an end. His union with Leticia, an adopted daughter of a count’s family, began just as simply, a one year contractual marriage. But the Grand Duke slowly grew attached to Leticia, and just as he was about to confess his feelings after returning from the battlefield, he was struck with shock. 

Leticia had already died from a terminal illness. 

Regretting his own indifference, he risked his life and used the power of ancient magic to turn back time. This time, he is determined to save Leticia, to grant her happiness, and so he proposes the contractual marriage once more. 

But there’s a problem. 

Merely watching her isn’t enough. He wants her. Forever.

title: I Mistook the Hidden Identity of the Sub Male Lead
summary:
Mary Siringa has finally realized the error of her ways as a spoiled burden to her family. In her search for a job, she runs into Prince Grandiel, disguised as his alter ego, Nepenthes. Intrigued by Mary, Grandiel draws up a magical contract for her to be a maid in the imperial palace and work as his spy. Now, Mary must protect Grandiel's secret identity and comply with the other clauses of her contract, or else her heart will explode! Can Mary keep her true self hidden, or will she die trying?

---
**Official Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EC%B2%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B4-%EC%84%9C%EB%B8%8C%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%97%90%EA%B2%8C-%EC%9E%98%EB%AA%BB-%EA%B1%B8%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/3147), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55798486)

title: She Wasn’t My Daugther
summary: After ten years of chopping firewood (so tired ಠ╭╮ಠ), female immortals (one after another ╮(￣⊿￣)╭) knelt down and begged me to take them as my disciples! _(´ཀ`」 ∠)_

title: Genius Archer’s Streaming
summary:
Former archery prodigy Yoo Sanghyun was destined for greatness until an injury forced him to quit. Though his coach helped him secure a stable job, he never felt like he belonged. Frustrated, he leaves it all behind to pursue game streaming. 

Leveraging his incredible archery skills and the charm of his noob character, he quickly rises to fame as "Almond." Now, he's determined to dominate the gaming world, but will his virtual success translate into something greater in real life?

title: Even if the Villain’s Daughter Regresses
summary:
How would you win over an enemy who just won't stop killing you? 

Laila thought she had escaped death by figuring out how to turn back time, but her assassin finds her again... and again... and again! All because her sadistic villain of a father had to murder his entire family... 

When all her evasion plans fail, there's only one option left: coddle her enemy through his childhood and hope he'll spare her when he comes back to exact his revenge. 

But why is this wacko so pigheaded?!

title: The World’s Best Engineer
summary: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power...?

title: My Wife Appeared at My Wife’s Funeral
The End of The Marriage
summary: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.

title: Come On Now, Even If I’m Not A Villain
summary: After being killed by her own father, I woke up... 500 years later?! To make things worse, I’ve been reborn into the body of a so-called villainess—a woman hated by her family and fiancé for her fragile health and sharp temper. All I wanted was to live quietly and figure out why I was reincarnated. But now, my once-cold family and fiancé are suddenly desperate for my attention, and my slave boy from 500 years ago has returned... perfectly alive. As if that wasn’t enough, immortal weapons from ancient times are starting to gather around me. "You shouldn’t have fed the stray dog." I never gave anyone a single bite, so why is this happening?!

title: Wild Night
summary: No summary available.

title: How to Retire as a Disaster Necromancer
Yeonwoo’s Innocence
summary:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)

title: Reincarnation of the Martial God
summary:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6325420), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=774044)

title: The Cruelty of Salvation
summary:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

title: The 101st Love Confession
summary:
Lucia Agnes has confessed to her longtime crush 98 times over the past 13 years.

And Herwin Peneus has always turned her down.

After her 99th confession is also rejected, Lucia finally decides to give up on Herwin and agrees to meet a suitor chosen by her parents.

But just as she makes up her mind to get engaged to this new match, things start to take an unexpected turn...

title: I Healed The Male Lead’s Trauma
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Pulling the Grand Duke’s Leash
summary: A girl who can see emotions as "light" is reborn as an extra in a novel. Seeking peace, she settles in a forest hut, only to discover it’s the cursed territory of a feared duke. Uniquely able to calm his curse, she strikes a deal with him, but on one condition: he must take the form of a snow leopard when they’re together.

title: The Crazy Killer Whale’s Favourite Penguin
summary:
Born as a penguin, I miraculously transformed into a human. The problem? My guardian, the Tower Master, hates beastmen. Fearing discovery, I ran away, only to be found out by a self-proclaimed penguin enthusiast.

Whale clan orca beastman, Suuradel, looked at me intensely, his eyes reddening sensually.

“Ha… Your wild eyes are incredible.”

Those aren’t eyes, just white feathers.

“May I touch your belly fat?”

Seriously? Furious, I pecked at him, but he looked oddly elated.

“Did you just kiss me?”

…It seems I got caught by a lunatic, not a penguin enthusiast.

title: I Was Reincarnated as a Baby Fox God
summary:
The princess of the Roachim Empire was killed by her older brother.
Killed, accused of killing their father, the Emperor, she…
 
Kyuaang?
 
…was reincarnated as a divine beast?!
 
An unexpected second life.
But something seems weird?
 
The ruler of the north of the Roachim Empire.
The owner of the Idelbadour Mountains and the Ice Wall.
The Grand Duke of Elharan, whom the Emperor himself cannot approach recklessly…
 
‘My dad, so you mean I’m a divine beast?!’
 
***
 
“My lady…!”
“Please accept these tributes and send down your blessings!”
 
The villagers knelt together at once and prayed earnestly.
While wiggling and not knowing what to do, I heard the sound of laughter in my ear.
 
-Lusha got stronger!
-She’s strong! She’s fresh! She’s thrilling!
-Look at that, even the humans surrendered in the face of Lusha!

The spirits were terribly proud of her, saying that the humans were afraid because of Lusha’s power.
And they lifted her in the air and carried her.
Encompassing her was also a dazzling light that appeared out of nowhere.
Everyone who was praying opened their eyes wide.
 
“It’s the blessing of the Divine Beast!”
“Hooray for the Baby Fox!”
 
Lusha sighed.
 
“Kiiyuu…”

title: The Princess is Evil
summary: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?

title: I Live with My Villain Uncle
summary:
A girl with foresight is sent to live with her cold, villainous uncle after her mother’s death.

Determined to save him from a dark future, she clings to him only to find roles reversed as he grows emotionally dependent. 

With a possessive childhood friend and a desperate father added to the chaos, her simple mission spirals out of control.

title: Girl with a Knife
summary:
One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)

title: My Dad Is Too Strong
summary:
What? My elder sister, who is lazy, charming, and abusive, is not born of the same parents as me? What? She wants to be a Superstar, but fortunately, I have a system and a cheat. Help remove all obstacles in her way! What? My parents asked me to help solve her single status problem, but I’m still single! Why don’t you guys care for me? ! The system said: I think the two of you are quite suitable, and I will match you guys up. I won’t do it, As a brother, I will protest against it!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30704)
- [Alternative Raw (IQIYI)](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1hjftkhw59x.html)
- [Alternative English (HoneyToon)](https://honeytoon.com/comic/my-sister-is-a-big-star)

title: The Third Prince of the Fallen Kingdom has Regressed
summary:
The third prince of the Briall Kingdom, Yuri, runs away alone and saves his life at the last moment when the kingdom is about to fall. Wandering with regret and guilt, he eventually meets death. 

But when he opens his eyes again, he sees his father's familiar face...?

One painful regret is enough. Yuri will save the kingdom from destruction!

title: Farming in Beast World: My Villainous Snake Cubs are Super Clingy
Heavenly Inquisition Sword
summary:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title: Spirit of the Shrine: The Snake Swallowing Child
summary: Years ago, Yul opened the door to the village shrine with the village children, which was taboo : the monster that came out of the door killed the village children and disappeared, and Yul was driven out of the village. Years later, Yul returned to the village and faced the monster again, and Jisoo, the village shaman's son, told Yul that only the person who opened the door to the shrine can close it again...

title: The Villain Discovered My Identity
summary:
Although she had been a promising practitioner of kendo in the past, due to an accident she was forced to lead a plain life. After Seo Yuri gets into a car accident during a trip back home, she reincarnates into the novel, *The Song of the Moon*, and becomes the elder twin sister of a side character who meets a destructive ending– Selena. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights’ squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!

---
A lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but she’s doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity won’t be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning "Sir Celestine" into his top henchman. With the threat of execution looming over her head, can Selena avoid getting caught by the villain?

title: Conquering Dungeons With Copy Paste!
summary: Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?

title: If I Don’t Die Soon, I Will Rule The Demon Realm
summary: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
